AD_PartySuppressionCrecheDestructionOngo.synopsis: AD playing on Laezel while the Creche destruction is ongoing
AD_PartySuppressionCrecheDestructionOngo.how_to_trigger: Click on Laezel while the Creche destruction is ongoing

AD_CrecheMarkings.synopsis: Laezel comments in AD about the markings, signalling there's a creche nearby.Varies depending on your current knowledge about the Creche's location at this point.
AD_CrecheMarkings.how_to_trigger: Avatar Laezel or Orphaned Companion Laezel walk by the markings in the Creche. Only plays before you have actually been inside the Creche.

automatic_ordering.reasoning: AD_CrecheMarkings is triggered when you are still unaware of the creche's interior—as it only plays before you have entered the creche. In contrast, AD_PartySuppressionCrecheDestructionOngoing takes place when the creche is already under attack (i.e. after you’ve entered or the creche is undergoing destruction). This means that if the player has reached the creche destruction stage (triggering AD_PartySuppressionCrecheDestructionOngoing), then AD_CrecheMarkings would no longer be viable. In this way, if both sessions are encountered in a given playthrough, AD_CrecheMarkings must come first, but often the conditions required for AD_PartySuppressionCrecheDestructionOngoing preclude AD_CrecheMarkings from ever occurring. Thus, they are not only ordered but also mutually exclusive in the same narrative path.

AD_PartySuppressionCrecheDestructionOngo.speaker: Lae'zel
AD_PartySuppressionCrecheDestructionOngo.text: Quickly - find a way to shut this thing down!

AD_CrecheMarkings_0.speaker: Lae'zel
AD_CrecheMarkings_0.text: Tir'su script, scratched in the ground. The crèche must be nestled in the mountains nearby.

AD_CrecheMarkings_1.speaker: Lae'zel
AD_CrecheMarkings_1.text: Tir'su script, scratched in the ground. The crèche must be nested in the temple below.

AD_CrecheMarkings_2.speaker: Lae'zel
AD_CrecheMarkings_2.text: Tir'su script, scratched in the ground. As I thought - the crèche is nested in the temple below.
